name: Jettison (Unfinished)
description:
This is an old project, I decided to upload it in an unfinished state since I probably won't finish it.

Controls:

  • W - thruster
  • Mouse - look
  • Left Click - shoot
  • Esc - quit (freezes on web version)

Shoot enemies, destroy motherships, get scrap, and power up the jump gate at the end of the system!

Systems are procedurally generated.
